meta_title: Invesco India Medium Duration Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Invesco India Medium Duration Fund Direct   Growth is Medium Duration Debt mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 2/10. It has track record of 3 years, with three year return of 5.65. Risk is Moderate
scheme_name: Invesco India Medium Duration Fund Direct   Growth
description: The scheme seeks to generate income by investing in a portfolio of Debt and Money Market Instruments suchthat the Macaulay duration of the portfolio is between 3 years and 4 years.
benchmark: NIFTY Medium Duration Debt Index A-III
benchmark_name: NIFTY Medium Duration Debt Index A-III

analysis.analysis_desc: 3Y annualised returns lower than category average by 0.21%
1Y annualised returns higher than category average by 0.65%

amc_info.name: Invesco Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: 2101 - A-A Wing - 21st Floor,Marathon Futurex,N.M. Joshi Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai 400013
amc_info.description: Invesco Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 24/07/2006 and its managing total assets of â‚¹25,182 Cr. Its ranked at 16 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Invesco Asset Management Private Limited targets to fulfill the needs of the domestic and international market through mutual funds and boasts of a management team that believes to create optimum results for investors. Invesco provides aims to provide excellent financial service to its investors by making sustainable business models, which has helped the company to scale up in the past.

Being one of the best investment management firm, it has an asset under management of USD 934.2 billion. It has dedicated team of professionals who analyze the market with precision,in order to take the right financial decisions.

Invesco believes in having a dynamic outlook in a fast-changing financial world. It offers a wide array of funds, ranging across various market capitalization and categories and they cater to clients in more than 120 countries.

category_info.tax_impact: Returns are taxed as per your Income Tax slab.
category_info.description: Invest predominantly in Government Securities(minimum 80% of total assets). They are relatively more risky than the other debt funds due to fluctuating interest rates.

fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Invesco Mutual Fund, he has worked with Reliance General Insurance Company Ltd. as CIO and with ICAP India Pvt. Ltd as fixed income dealer.
